segments.text: I observe the kitchen layout with the sink on the right.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window above it frames a tidy garden view.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A woman stands drying a plate with a towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes are stacked neatly on the counter nearby.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the faucet is on, and the sink is full to overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water spills over the edge onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The upper cabinets are open, revealing the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy is on a step stool, stretching to grab cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool seems unstable, legs spread wide.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A girl stands below, hand raised expectantly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks ready to catch a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene feels like everyday family life.
segments.speaker: PAR
